# Publishers.First.Failure

**Type Alias**

The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Failure = Upstream.Failure
```

## Discussion

This publisher uses its upstream publisher’s failure type.

## Declaring supporting types

- **Publishers.First.Output**: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.description: The kind of values published by this publisher.
